item.title: MIUI OS1.0.38.0.UNBCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 14 Pro / Ti China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 Pro / Ti China

Codename: shennong

Size: 8.7 GB

MD5: 85fbbcd4daf8f0c1161ba8fe38fb2ef5

Updated Android Security Patch to February 2024. Increased system security.
[Camera]
New: Elevate your photos with "Master portrait" and "Leica portrait" options
Optimization: High definition images in Portrait mode
Optimization: Beautify in Portrait mode
Improve the quality of your portrait photography with all-new Xiaomi AISP large AI model
